---

This issue will provision a new Kubernetes Cluster on Azure (AKS).

Cluster information:

```json
{
  "resource_group" : "<YOUR_RESOURCE_GROUP>",
  "cluster_name" : "tug-kube",
  "version" : "1.19.9",
  "region" : "West Europe"
}
```
